name: 艾哈迈德·卢坎
name_full: 艾哈迈德·卢坎 Ahmed Lucan

last_movies.title: 黑道新上路 第一季

introduction: Ahmed Lucan moved to Los Angeles to pursue his acting career after completing his bachelors in business management and finance from Mercer University. He has worked in over 60 films and TV shows over the past 15 years in Hollywood, including Sully, Homeland, Blacklist, Seal Team and Superfly to name a few. After years of struggling to find non-stereotypical opportunities in the entertainment business, Ahmed decided to focus on developing his own content. He wants to tell stories from an immigrant perspective, and build a film with a diverse cast and crew. "Silencer" is his directorial debut.
